name: Heavenly Bane
text: Your weapons carry a trace of the divine when imbued with your bane ability.
benefit: Whenever you have a weapon imbued with the bane special quality, that weapon is considered good and lawful for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
text_zh: 当你的武器被灌入你的破敌能力时，带上了一丝神圣的痕迹。
benefit_zh: 当你持有一件施展了破敌职业能力的武器时，在判定克服伤害减免时该武器就可以被认定是善良与守序的。
